title: Best_Change
author: Best_Change
content: We would like to reward our loyal fans who actively interacted with our service, with a little gift.Specially for our 16th anniversary, we are collecting applications to receive memorable NFTs form our project. Recipients of the tokens can get privileges in some of our future activities.Criteria for selecting token winners:Â· wrote to our support for any questions between 19.06.2007 up to and including 31.05.2023;Â· left any feedback for exchangers in our monitor between 01.01.2013 up to and including 31.05.2023;Â· registered as an affiliate partner between 06.10.2010 up to and including 31.05.2023.Â· wrote in our ANN topic on the forum bitcointalk between 12.04.2018 up to and including 31.05.2023, or at some point participated in our Signature campaign.If you fall under at least one of these criteria, congratulations, you can claim your reward. To receive the prize, please send us your application for a drop in a free form to our email green@bestchange.com.If you are the forum member, send the address though the PMs on the forum. For convenience, send the link to your message, thank you.Important: Please send us, together with your application, the address of your ethereum/polygon wallet, so we could send you the present on BestChangeâ€™s birthday. To receive the token, please do not use exchange addresses or deposit addresses of payment systems, but only non-custodial wallets.If you do not have a wallet yet, you can register it in any available service, for example, MetaMask, OneKey, Brave Wallet, Enkrypt, Bitkeep, Torus, Portis and any other.Tokens will be credited in Polygon network to all participants meeting the conditions during the day of 19.06.2023. Applications are accepted strictly before 18.06.2023 23:59:59 UTC+3.

The figure is very impressive and deserving of respect.To be honest, I will gladly accept a memorable NFT gift. Not for the sake of speculation, in order to sell it more expensive in the future (which is exactly what happens in the industry with the NFT), but as a memento in order to tell grandchildren about it in the future.
